This is a project by Isabella Hidalgo analysing data on the top 5000 albums on Spotify. It uses the Top5000 dataset from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/lucascantu/top-5000-albums-of-all-time-spotify-features/versions/1?resource=download).
